remarks: If ` B ` falls between ` A ` and ` C ` , then ` A B ` is no longer than ` A C ` .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: btwnsegle $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ C e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( B Btwn <. A , C >. -> <. A , B >. Seg<_ <. A , C >. ) ) $.
